title: Futago no Mahoutsukai Lico to Gli (The Wizard of twins LICO & GLI)
synopsis: Glico, the prominent food manufacturer best known for its pretzel stick snacks Pocky and Pretz, has long relied on its classic running man character and real-life celebrities to promote its products. Now it has finally bowed to prevailing trends and introduced two moe-style anime characters to broadcast its message.
